mapper.select: SELECT business_id AS businessId, pass, name, phone, business_number AS businessNumber, business_name AS businessName, business_picture AS businessPicture, email, mobile, postNum, address1, address2, xpoint, ypoint, business_profile AS businessProfile, bank_name AS bankName, bank_number AS bankNumber, deposit, open_time AS openTime, close_time AS closeTime, break_time AS breakTime, day_off AS dayOff, introduction, regDate, store_onoff AS storeOnoff FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{id}
